alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 1:39PM CST until January 29 at 7:31AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Hale, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Heavy rainfall is expected over the Black Warrior River basin in and a flood warning is now in effect for the Black Warrior River. The next statement will be Wednesday evening.late tonight at 445 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 75.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening to a crest of 92.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
